com.netflix.nicobar.core.module

Interface ScriptModuleListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseScriptModuleListener

    public interface ScriptModuleListener
    Listener for new/updated or deleted modules.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void archiveRejected(ScriptArchive scriptArchive, ArchiveRejectedReason reason, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Notification that a script archive was rejected by the module loader
      void moduleUpdated(ScriptModule newScriptModule, ScriptModule oldScriptModule)
      Notification that a module was newly created or updated.

    • Method Detail

      • moduleUpdated

        void moduleUpdated(@Nullable
                 ScriptModule newScriptModule,
                 @Nullable
                 ScriptModule oldScriptModule)
        Notification that a module was newly created or updated.
        Parameters:
        newScriptModule - newly loaded version of the module. NULL if the module has been deleted.
        oldScriptModule - old version of the module that will be unloaded. NULL if this is a new module.

      • archiveRejected

        void archiveRejected(ScriptArchive scriptArchive,
                   ArchiveRejectedReason reason,
                   @Nullable
                   java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Notification that a script archive was rejected by the module loader
        Parameters:
        scriptArchive - archive that was rejected
        reason - reason it was rejected
        cause - underlying exception which triggered the rejection
